attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown to resign as he was never voted in as prime minister. also for the fact hundreds of thousands of british manufacturing jobs have been lost due to his high taxes and severe mismanagement of the british economy
also the fact that the british workforce have never been taxed so high as we are under this administration

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
